text: thanks for setting this up, Luke!

the emails i generate from my e-news template end up being clipped in Gmail. when i save the generated HTML and check the file size, it comes in at 78.5K, well below the 102K max in Gmail. but if Gmail's clipping 'em, something must be getting added on the way out the door. where's that extra baggage coming from?
check out magran's post and give it an upvote if you feel so inclined: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Minified-CSS-for-HubSpot-Responsive-Email-Template/idi-p/242757>
